QuestData.Title: Back to Bladespire Citadel
QuestData.Description: Durotan must be told of your vision. Pul Windcarver will offer you a flight back.$B$BThe fate of the Frostwolf... of Draenor, depends upon you, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Durotan at Bladespire Citadel.
QuestData.RewardText: Grim news indeed, $n.$B$BFor saving Wolf Home, I would name you wolf-$g brother:sister;.$B$BNow we must defend Frostfire Ridge from the Thunderlord clan and the Iron Horde.
